tagline: sampgdk allows you to write SA:MP game modes in C/C++
body:
Latest sampgdk release is **3.1.3**

### Downloads

Download C/C++ headers and pre-compiled binaries for your system:
* [Linux (self-extracting archive)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/blob/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-Linux.sh)
* [Linux (tarball)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/blob/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-Linux.tar.gz)
* [Windows (installer)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/blob/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-win32.exe)
* [Windows (ZIP archive)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/blob/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-win32.zip)

Older versions can be found [here](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/tree/downloads).
name: sampgdk
